pr_title: SOLR-14289 Skip ZkChroot check when not necessary

timeline.bodyText: So, what other than "zookeeper" is used here?  Do we just need a boolean if this is the only value?
timeline.author: dsmiley

replies.bodyText: Yea, a boolean would be sufficient. I was thinking about if we need to have other sources in the future, but we can change this to a string/enum later.
replies.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: Then I much prefer a boolean as it'd be much clearer -- "isInZooKeeper" or some-such.
replies.author: dsmiley
